entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
